content:
I can't add resources to a GB2 project from a FHIR server.
See for example http://gb2.clinfhir.com#id1640293156316
Click to Select a Patient from the Server, then search for Arthur, and click on the patient's name, it shows the patient and 8 conditions.
If I click Add to import list, nothing happens
If I expand Patient and click on the patient name, a spinner shows up on the top line like something is happening, but it does not seem to end (keeps spinning), but again nothing happens when I click "Add to import list".
If I click on Add all resources to download queue, nothing happens.
Resources to download stays at zero (0).
Am I doing something wrong, or does GB2 have a bug to prevent adding resources from a server?

Possible cause:
curl -I http://gb2.clinfhir.com/gb/transformJsonToFsh
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found

TBH this is quite experimental. I've experimented with using goFsh to import resources but it's rather more complicated than it might seem! (especially the potential references). So it's definitely not you :). Is there a specific use case you're wanting to do, or just trying things out?
